review: Very quick and easy setup. Picture quality and sound is better than what I got through cable provider.

review: So far much much better than using the apps on my smart tv

review: Although I may get the Fire Stick next. It's become my go to streaming source of late. Good solid service. The customer service is top rate as well. When I first got it there were issues with the box but they took care of it quickly and were really friendly.
author: snowwrite

review: I LOVE IT. USE IT MORE THAN REG. TV STATIONS NOW.
author: Ernest R.

review: Easy to set up and easy to use :)
